jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossbones behind it

keyMoments.title: First Member Joins
keyMoments.description: Roronoa Zoro officially becomes the first member to join Luffy's crew, marking the true formation of the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: The most important recruitment in the series - establishes the crew's foundation and the bond between captain and first mate.

keyMoments.title: Marines Arrest Morgan
keyMoments.description: The Marines of the 153rd Branch arrest their own captain for his tyrannical abuse of power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that justice can come from within corrupt organizations and not all Marines are corrupt.

keyMoments.title: Koby Joins
keyMoments.description: Koby officially joins the Marines as a recruit, beginning his journey to become an admiral.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Koby's path as a Marine and sets up future encounters with Luffy.
